CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Priority__c , 'High'), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/red.png", 'High', 25, -1), IF( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Priority__c , 'Medium'), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/orange.png", 'Medium', 25, -1), IF( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Priority__c , 'Low'), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/default.png", 'Low', 25, -1), '' )))
CustomField.label: Priority Flag
